name: Office Rivals
summary: Office Rivals is a slice-of-life visual novel and a love story between two office-rivals-turned-lovers, inspired by wholesome doujinshi and webtoons!

name: Office Party
summary: Take your escapades into the Office and other new locations in this long awaited sequel to House Party! You've made it through the interview process and you're starting a new job. Make a good impression and get promoted. Make the wrong choices and get demoted. Work your way up the corporate ladder in this hysterical, story-rich 3D adventure game with a lot of new surprises and upgrades from the traditional House Party game play.

name: Office Inspector
summary: Identify anomalies and dangers in a mysterious office complex and make the right decisions to escape using the elevator.

name: Of Guards and Thieves
summary: Of Guards and Thieves is a multiplayer stealth game in which high-powered guards face off against fast and elusive thieves in a contest of wits. Outsmarting the enemy and shooting your way through to the goal are equally valid strategies. A game with simple rules, emergent gameplay and high replayability, Of Guards and Thieves is sure to be a showstopper in your gaming collection!

name: Off the Table
summary: Use your strategy to win the game! Can't find a game for two? Off The Table is the choice for multiplayers. Flick your friend's ball off the table using your strategy! In 2-player mode, each one has 10 shots in one round. Various props to make the ball either bigger or smaller. Additional bombs to destroy everything on the table. Use your brain, calculate the angle, your mission is to shoot your component's ball off the table, and keep your balls remain as many as possible. In 1-player mode, there are over 100+ challenging levels with amazing gameplay mechanics. Fast-moving obstacles, sliders, bombs... Endless fun even playing alone, which is a best chance practicing your skills and fight with friends! Invite your friends and compete on one device now!

name: Offworlders
summary: A retro-futuristic single player survival RPG where you control a hand-picked team of 4 separate characters; each with their own unique specializations, attributes, and inventories.

name: Officers
summary: Officers is a Real Time Strategy Game for the PC set during World War II and features three distinct campaigns to play.

name: Offroad Mechanic Simulator
summary: Service off-road vehicles and take them for a drive! Offroad Mechanic Simulator lets you modify many classic off-road vehicles and prepare them for daunting tasks that no normal car could ever hope to complete. Test your work and climb steep cliffs or drive through rivers and deep layers of mud.

name: Offensive Combat: Redux!
summary: Launching August 18, 2017 in North America and Europe Offensive Combat: Redux! is a fast-paced, irreverent online FPS game based in the Offensive Combat universe. OC:R! lets you show your skill, play, and pwn your enemies, as a number of different characters including Commandos, Aliens, Geckos, Chickens, Orcs, Pirates and meme-inspired skins (Drumpf and Killary), as you match-up against up to 15 other players on each map. With 6 maps at launch and multiple modes including Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Exploration, and Bot Mode, and with more content in the works, Offensive Combat: Redux! is a unique FPS game that you won't want to miss.

name: Off-Road Redneck Racing
summary: Yeehah! Stop yer grinnin' and drop yer linen, cause the slam bangin'est, mud-flappin'est off-road driving game ever created is comin' to Steam! Motor trucks 'n Buggies over the most brutal Southland terrain ever seen in a racing game.

name: Off-Score: A Game of Songs
summary: A surreal game that tells the stories of 3 songs. Play the music until the end by solving the puzzles and secrets along the way.

name: Off the Grid
summary: In Off The Grid, players step into the shoes of lone adventurer Rowland Felix as he sets out to explore the mystery that is foiled across the altered dimension he lies in ...

name: OfficeEscape
summary: 《OFFICE ESCAPE》is a Room Escape game. Player locate in the office and the mistery house. the broken memory, the strange environment，dark light, in this environment,player need to collect clues in each room. Escape from the house and find out who you are.

name: Off Target
summary: "Off-Target" is a classic side-scrolling shooter set in the near future. Experience the thrill of shooting and the feeling of explosions in your spare time.

name: Of Pawns & Kings
summary: "Of Pawns & Kings" is a slightly modernized, visually stunning, point&click adventure in the spirit of Monkey Island, Riven and Labyrinth. (the Jim Henson movie) Solve puzzles, combine items, talk to fascinating characters and advance in the rich story. Can you reveal all the secrets to make a stand

name: Off to Sleep
summary:
An adventure highly focused on the story.
2D strategic RPG with turn-based battles.
The combat system allows you to configure your robot ally's AI.
Topics covered: ethics, determinism, relativism, definition of "life" and "conscience".

name: Off
summary: The player is tasked with controlling the Batter and guiding him on his quest to "purify" the world of spirits. The player must take the Batter through the various Zones, collect battle partners, solve puzzles and partake in turn-based Active Time Battles in order to get to the source of the impurity.

name: Offroad Driving Simulator 4x4: Trucks & SUV Trophy
summary: Go for extreme offroad drive, desert, forests, mud road and snowy wastes are waiting for a good offroad SUV driver! Try our new 4x4 offroad driving simulator - a cool offroad driver game with hill climb driving, lots of cool 4x4 and 6x6 trucks and tons of offroad game fun! > Go on an epic offroad trip across FOUR REGIONS > Drive DOZENS of various TRUCKS and SUVs > Purchase VISIBLE UPGRADES to improve your driving > Use WINCH, DIFF LOCK and other special mechanisms > Complete special MISSIONS and CHALLENGES for rewards Offroad championship! Global offroad driving contest is about to begin! Prove that your are the best at offroad driving across four regions with different conditions and trials on trucks of three various types. Prepare your self for a lot of extreme challenge - start your engine and go offroad! Powerful 4x4 cars! Get behind the wheel of all sorts of offroad vehicles of various types and classes, from a regular 4x4 SUV to gigantic monster-truck. Each is equipped with special offroad driving devices, like winch, and can be visibly upgraded for better performance. Use all you have to get and edge in driving! Driving challenge! Face various challenges of the extreme offroad - cross rivers and snowy forests, climb up hill and crawl over rocks. And complete various additional challenges and mission to get cool rewards. Make your own way to the title of the champion! Take part in Pathfinder trials - the most extreme offroad driving tournament ever!

name: Office Lovers
summary: It's a romance game where you can experience the thrill of an office romance where you have to keep your relationship secret. What will happen when you're alone with him in the conference room?

name: Of Guards and Thieves: Racing
summary: Of Guards and Thieves: Racing includes a new Free to Play Racing game mode with three unique vehicles, new classes, skins and 6 new official racing maps. Plus Map Editor support for Racing mode and tons of new map editor tiles that will allow you to build your racing circuits!

name: Offline Games
summary: Looking for a relaxing and entertaining way to pass the time without an internet connection? "100+ Offline Games No WiFi Fun" offers a carefully curated collection of puzzles and games designed to keep you engaged and entertained wherever you are. Whether you're traveling, commuting, or just unwinding at home, this app delivers endless offline fun.

name: Of Gods and Men: The Daybreak Empire
summary: A retro-inspired turn-based strategy. Conquer your way across a war-ravaged world to forge a new empire and impart an unprecedented era of peace!

name: Off Road Stars
summary: Race tiny trucks around the circuit. Take control of one of up to 8 off-road racing cars and compete in a race track looking down from an isometric perspective.

name: Office Assistant
summary: A top-down office-life simulator where you drink coffee, smash printers with a hammer, and survive the inbox. Welcome to corporate bliss.

name: Of Kings and Men
summary: Of Kings And Men is an independently developed third-person multiplayer “ Persistent Medieval War” game. Set in 13th century with both European and Eastern influences, you play as a character in a vast open world full of alliances and conflict, with an emphasis on player-driven experiences.

name: Off the Shelf!
summary: Off the Shelf! is a hilarious physics-based romp made for maximum chaos! Launch a free ragdoll character into a frantic rush, knocking objects off shelves to rack up points. Master the art of Shelf Surfing as you jump, dash, and smash your way to a high score!

name: Of Love and Eternity
summary: A stylized horror adventure game

name: Of Mice and Sand: Revised
summary: On a desert planet in the farthest reaches of space, mice await your command! Direct their mobile fortress, and seek the legendary city of gold!

name: Off Course
summary: Stuck in a time loop, stop the possessed captain's plans in this cooperate-with-yourself puzzle game. Record each pirate’s actions to solve puzzles, interact with adorable animal companions and get to know the brave pirate crew and the bond they share with each other!

name: Office Wars
summary: Office Wars was a casual, strategy-laced Facebook/social game launched around July 2010 by Broken Bulb Studios . In this tongue-in-cheek office simulator, players manage a team of quirky employees outfitted with absurd weapons (think giant shrimp, staplers, etc.) to "battle" rival office workers across cubicle corridorsO

name: Office Crush Dating Simulator
summary: A dating simulator where you romance your handsome co-workers and nothing goes wrong.

name: Of Slimes and Sandwiches
summary:
Of Slime and Sandwiches was a collaborative project made over several discord calls with friends.

The plot, characters, artwork and other aspects were all decided on the spot during those calls, and the result was this: a masterpiece for the ages.

name: Office Sex
summary: Enjoy a steamy visual novel series about an ambitious young woman trying to land a job in a prestigious office building.

name: Of the Devil: Episode 0
summary: When Morgan finds herself assigned as Public Defender for the man the police say has shot six people through the heart, she'll need to leverage all her wits and the full force of her "unique insight" into the case to come out unscathed and on-top.

name: Office Run
summary: Free and exclusively on PC! Office Run is an endless runner game built around the office theme with 6 playable characters, leveling system, skills, upgrades, power-up items and online highscores. Start as new Intern in the company and move up the ladder until you become the next CEO!

name: Office 29
summary: In Office 29, a seemingly normal workday turns into a nightmarish journey through a haunted office. You wake up at night, alone, and must gather your belongings while navigating terrifying anomalies that distort reality. As you explore, strange events unfold—lights flicker, shadows move, and eerie figures lurk outside the window. Each anomaly hides secrets, pushing you deeper into the unknown.

name: Offworld Trading Company: The Patron and the Patriot
summary: If you thought being the CEO of a company and maintaining a monopoly on Mars was hard work before, get ready to double down with a bunch of new campaign enhancements in the Patron and the Patriot! With two new characters joining the fray, new story-driven content, new game modes, and more, this DLC takes the single player experience and adds hours of additional entertainment and content to explore.

name: Offroad Truck Simulator: Heavy Duty Challenge
summary: Experience unparalleled offroad driving in Offroad Truck Simulator: Heavy Duty Challenge. Travel through the breathtaking landscapes of Utah's rugged terrain, delve into the dense European forests, and dominate diverse terrains in France, Poland, Austria, and Iceland. This game delivers an exhilarating off-road experience with an extensive fleet of massive and formidable trucks.

name: Offworld Trading Company: Interdimensional
summary: Your conquest of offworld markets has taken you not only to Mars, but to the moons of Ceres, Europa, and Io. Each world comes with its own trials and challenges - now, you can face all of them down at once in Offworld Trading Company: Interdimensional.

name: OF Model Simulator
summary: From first post to full-blown icon - manage fans, cash, and chaos in the ultimate exclusive model simulator. Fame has never been this hands-on.

name: Office Secrets
summary:
Office Secrets is an otome game by Voltage Inc. It is available on Android and iPhone.

Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Offworld Trading Company: Limited Supply
summary: Before business on Mars started booming, the first pioneers from Earth had just one objective: survive. Play through over a dozen challenging scenarios and overcome the struggles of settling on Mars by aiding the growing colonies and ensuring their healthy futures.

name: Offworld Trading Company: Scenario Toolkit
summary: Challenge yourself with four new scenarios, designed by top OTC competitor “Blues” to test your ability turn a profit in less than ideal conditions.

name: Off the Clock
summary: Stop time! In space! A short hand-painted retro adventure about crashing a party to save the world.

name: Of Lies and Rain
summary: Of Lies and Rain is a story-driven first person shooter built exclusively for VR. Set in a dark, sci-fi, post-apocalyptic world, at the edge of the real and digital realm. You’ll fight to reclaim your past and save humanity from the brink of extinction.

name: Officespace
summary: OFFICESCAPE is a first-person puzzle-platformer adventure game. In OFFICESCAPE you play as yourself, you are stuck in a dream and you are trying to wake up.

name: Office No. 41
summary: Experience an adventure horror gameplay. Solve puzzles, find secretes and don't get catched by the creatures of this abandoned place. Be ready to hide wherever you can. The puzzles you must solve can be very different. In some moments, be very attentive and use your brain.

name: Offline Games
summary:
Get ready for 'Offline Games': fun for all ages, and a mental workout too! This offline game collection is like an overflowing toy box packed with more than 20 unique minigames. It's designed for classic game enthusiasts, puzzle lovers, and challenge seekers. And the best part? You don't need an internet connection to enjoy it!

Our array of Number Games like 2048 and 2248 will get your neurons firing. Engage in these numeric challenges and strive to hit the highest scores. They're perfect for keeping your mind sharp, and they're addictive, too! You'll find yourself coming back to beat your own scores time and again.

Word Games are a great way to expand your vocabulary and language skills. With word guess and word finder, you'll embark on an adventure through a maze of letters, uncovering hidden words, and building your own word lists. It's a fun way to learn new words, and the challenge will keep you hooked for hours.

Feel the adrenaline rush with our Thrilling Challenges. Step into the mind-bending world of Minesweeper, where every click could be your last. Or play Hangman, where you'll rack your brains to guess the right letters before time runs out.

We've brought back some of your favorite Classic Memory Games. Engage your brain in our sound memory game, a modern twist on the classic 'Simon Says'. For a bit of nostalgia, we've also included the much-loved game of Snake.

For the serious strategists and thinkers out there, our Mind Benders section is perfect. Chess and Chess puzzles will provide a mental workout and fun brain training. Hone your strategic skills, and take on the challenge to become the grandmaster.

Our Two-Player Games offer the perfect opportunity for a friendly showdown. Go head-to-head with AI in games like Checkers, Pool, or Tic Tac Toe, even when you're in airplane mode. It's fun gaming action whenever you want, wherever you are! See if your friends can do better!

Our collection includes brain-stimulating games like Tap Match, Solitaire, Sudoku, Wood Blocks, 4 in a row, and the Sliding Puzzle in our Keep Them Thinking section. These games are designed to keep your mind sharp and focused, and they're also a lot of fun.

Ever wanted to try your hand at an exotic game? Now you can, right from your device, with Mancala in our Exotic Games section.

'Offline Games' is a fantastic app for all ages - kids, teens, adults, and even seniors. It offers a fun, engaging, and stimulating gaming experience without the need for an internet connection. Whether you're on a long journey, stuck at home, or in the middle of a flight, you're never far from the action with 'Offline Games'. It's the perfect app to challenge yourself, pass the time, and have loads of fun.

Remember, with 'Offline Games', you don't need an internet connection to play. You can enjoy your favorite games anytime, anywhere. Say goodbye to those dull moments and welcome endless entertainment with 'Offline Games'. Who knew having fun could be this easy? Jump in and start playing today!

name: Of Moons and Mania
summary: Of Moons and Mania is an interactive psychostic break, based on lived experience. It uses elements of its design to explain the struggles of psychosis, and tells a personal story about mental illness.

name: Of Frost and Flowers
summary: An otome-fantasy visual novel. Play as Alto, a fearless knight, and enter a world of magic and myths with secrets waiting for you to unveil.

name: Of the Devil: Episode 1
summary: Unlock the first of five episodic murder mysteries with the Episode 1 DLC for "of the Devil" and dive headfirst into the dark and thrilling corporate conspiracy that unfolds when the father of modern android programming is found dead of apparent suicide.

name: Off the Text
summary: Full-Keyboard Rhythm Game focused on mastering your entire keyboard. Inspired by 1970s-80s cinema, visuals are crafted with VHS aesthetics and montage techniques. Play every key at your own tempo with forgiving timing, but conquer brutal levels demanding simultaneous control of 40+ keys. Try it now!

name: Offroad MotorBike VR
summary: Get ready for an immersive offroad experience! Conquer challenging tracks and leave your competition in the dust with Offroad MotorBike VR on Steam. With realistic physics, stunning graphics, and VR technology, Download now and kickstart your offroad adventure!

name: Offroad Jeep 4x4: Car Driving Simulator
summary: In this offroad game, become a great 4x4 car driver in a big town.

name: Office 5
summary: Protect your family. Protect your coworkers. Verify today. Office 5 is an analog indie horror experience where the player can never be certain who is human or who is unverified.

name: Off-the-Ground Survival
summary: Trapped on the top floor, 99 stories off the ground, you hope to reach the ground floor and escape. With limited food and supplies, find your exit and survive the apocalypse!

name: Offworld Trading Company: Market Corrections
summary: Market Corrections is a new piece of downloadable content for Offworld Trading Company that features 12 brand new maps and 3 new character campaigns that share why humanity began to colonize Mars.

name: Of the Red, the Light, and the Ayakashi Tsuzuri
summary: A modern Japanese-style fantasy story involving Yue, a young boy born and raised at a shrine, and his friendship with the "Ayakashi" spirits. HaccaWorks* presents a mysterious, spiritual adventure game.

name: Offworld Trading Company: Conspicuous Consumption
summary: Express yourself with custom particles and audio for your advanced buildings! Give your game some classic sci-fi flare with retro-styled versions, or have a good laugh with the goofy fun time versions.

name: Off the Record: The Italian Affair
Office of Interstellar Production
summary: Take the reins of the newly founded Office of Interstellar Production, annex newly discovered star systems, mine resources and refine quality components to build mighty warships to deliver to the unceasing needs of the Navy. A chill sandbox resource management game.

name: Offworld Trading Company: Ceres Initiative
summary: Expand and exploit your way to Ceres to improve your fortunes. Use new buildings, technologies and resources in this new challenging environment for Offworld Trading Company.

name: Off Road
summary: Off Road is an addictive ultimate mud truck driving game and realistic car racing simulator. Are you ready to start the race in rugged environments and test your driving skills?

name: Of Grit & Graves
summary: "Of Grit and Graves" is a turn-based tactical dungeon crawler with dice-based mechanics that combines classic RPG elements with strategic combat.

name: Of the Devil: Episode 2
summary:
Getting used to her new work-life balance after the events of Episode 1 has left Morgan with some growing pains, and that kind of stress isn't good for anyone's mental health.

Fortunately for her, the lower wards of the city are the perfect getaway; full of broken cameras and choking fog, with streets monitored by gangs and governed with synthetic muscle.

What more could a girl ask for?

Time to get back into the swing of things.

name: OffiAtrix: Rise of the Team Leader
summary: An office action game where chairs drift, coffee flies, and work is optional! Hire, fire, and fight your way to the top! Expand. Dominate. Get rich. Just don’t end up without a chair and a paycheck!

name: Office Simulator
summary: Ready to climb the career ladder? In Office Simulator, start as an intern and rise through the corporate ranks. Gain experience, earn promotions, and when the time comes, launch your own company to begin a new business adventure.

name: Offshore
summary:
This modification offers a multi-level side story of Gordon Freeman while en-route to City 17 via Highway 17 in the infamous buggy.

When Gordon’s buggy was taken by the Combine Dropship, some maps of combine outposts hidden in one of the buggy’s side compartments were lost. Gordon was immediately dispatched by Dr. Kleiner and Dr. Eli Vance to locate the buggy and return the missing maps.

Setting: The entire modification is set at night on a small, rocky island off the coast of City 17. Rugged terrain, abandon structures, and multiple combine outposts will make escaping this island hell more than just a walk in the park.

His plan: Gordon surrenders to the combine so he could be transported to the facility where the buggy was left for scrap. Upon his surrender, he found himself in a small prison facility on the rocky island, waiting for a visit from Dr. Wallace Breen who would read his sentence personally. A familiar face woke him from his deep sedation…

His mission: Locate the buggy and find a way to return to City 17 with the stolen maps.

name: Office Battle
summary: Welcome to Office Battle! Many workers will lose their job because a layoff is happening very soon in your office. That is why "Big B" decided to organize a competition and the winners gets to keep his job. But don’t think that it will be easy.

name: Off-Road Velociraptor Safari
summary: A browser game involving jeeps and unsuspecting raptors.

name: Off the Chains Disc Golf
summary: Off The Chains Disc Golf is a lighthearted disc golf simulation developed for VR from the ground up. Play alone or with friends and learn how to become a disc golf pro with realistic disc flight physics. Earn Chain Link points to unlock new discs and customize your own collection.

name: Office Aberrations
summary: Office Aberrations is a first-person, spot-the-difference game, where you are stuck in an endlessly looping hallway. Determine if anything is out of place by carefully examining your surroundings. No detail is too small. Knowing if and where there are aberrations is your only way out.

name: Off the Wall
summary: One or two players bust through blocks in various formations using a paddle and ball, trying to reach an exit located in the center of the blocks in order to advance to the next wave. There are glowing blocks which give you "Power Ups" Xextra ball, Ccatch ball, I invinciball, S slow ball, B bigger paddle, F firepower which allows you to shoot blocks with a gun located in the center of your paddle. You get points for busting blocks, but get more bonus points for blocks left when you reach the exit. This game expands upon the classic Breakout theme in several ways. There are many levels with unique variations, such as new blocks parachuting in to replace the blocks which you just busted, barrier blocks that cannot be busted, moving blocks, and objects which can deflect or place spin upon the ball. If you keep the ball in play long enough, the ball splits in two. In the two-player mode, you only get points when the ball color matches your paddle color. The ball color is determined by the last paddle to hit the ball. This game adds enough twists to the classic Breakout to make for very interesting gameplay. When the game ends you can continue where you left off by adding additional credits, but your score at the end of a multiple credit game is determined by dividing your points by the number of credits played.

name: Off The Grid: Bad Dream
summary:
Off the Grid: Bad Dream (working title: Project Escher) is a first- and third-person psychological thriller and mystery adventure developed by Rare Castle. The game follows a man who survives a fatal car crash and begins experiencing surreal dreams connected to a plane of existence beyond space and time.

Gameplay alternates between the protagonist’s grounded real-world life and an otherworldly dream realm, where consciousness exists as light or energy within mechanical vessels. Players explore non-Euclidean environments, solve puzzles, engage in limited combat, and make narrative choices emphasizing introspection, moral decision-making, and emotional healing over traditional horror.

Featuring cinematic storytelling, dialogue-driven encounters, and visually distinct worlds inspired by impossible geometry and classical art, Off the Grid: Bad Dream blends mystery, philosophy, and emotional depth into a story-driven experience focused on self-discovery and healing rather than fear.

name: Office Bot Simulator
summary: Become the world's first robot secretary and prove that machines can replace humans in the office! You'll face hectic workdays, tight deadlines, the struggle for a paycheck, managing living expenses, and self-improvement.

name: Office Outbreak Savior
summary: The office is under zombie attack! Recruit coworkers and survive the outbreak.

name: Offworld Trading Company: Blue Chip Ventures
summary: Challenge yourself with this series of new single-player scenarios designed by one of the game's top competitors.

name: Offroad Racing
summary: Drive off the beaten track! Offroad Racing offers a huge choice of all-terrain vehicles to get away from everyday life. Bomb along in a quad bike, buggy or motocross race and enjoy the change of scenery as you explore immersive offroad tracks.

name: Office Affairs: Executive Decisions
summary: Office Affairs: Executive Decisions is a mature, open-world RPG that blends the intrigue of high-stakes corporate drama with the complexities of modern relationships. Set in the world of corporate finance, step into a world where power, passion, and politics collide.

name: Off Trail
summary: Off Trail is a procedurally generated infinite downhill skiing game. Discover the beauty, life, and treachery, of the mountain.

name: Of Light & Shadow
summary:
Of Light & Shadow is an award winning sidescrolling puzzle platformer for PC and Mac released under CC BY-NC-ND. The game combines two areas in each level, light and shadow, as well as two protagonists in one playable character, Mr. Light and Dr. Shadow. While either can only survive in light or shadow areas respectively, the player has to constantly switch between them and make the right decision about whose abilities to utilise.

Of Light & Shadow was achieved as a final project at the Salzburg University of Applied Sciences by a team of students called 12 Angry Devs.

name: Office Hero
summary: Office Hero is a top-down action, shooting, and roguelite game. Climb the floors of a building overrun by machines, choose your weapons, unlock new characters, and face challenging enemies and bosses in fast-paced, intense stages.

name: Offering App
summary:
OFFERING APP is a psychological survival horror. This app is supposed to help us.
YOU can help YOU with this app. We don't need to suffer anymore. Yay!

name: Offworld Trading Company: Almanac
summary: This 91 page Almanac contains: A detailed strategy guide by top-tier players Zultar and Cubit. Coverage from planetary geologist Kirby Runyon, who discusses each of the regions the game takes place in and how their real life features were used to influence the game’s map design.

name: Off-World Interceptor Extreme
summary:
Off-World Interceptor is a third-person vehicular car combat game, released only for the 3DO. An alternate version of the game was later released for the Sega Saturn and PlayStation consoles, named Off-World Interceptor Extreme. The two versions of the game have identical core gameplay elements, though the Extreme version is tweaked to feel more like the arcade mode in the original Off-World Interceptor.

The game was developed under the title "Orion Off-Road".

name: Off Road Racing
summary: Off-Road Racing is a thrilling game with three challenging levels set in forests, deserts, and icy mountains. Race through rugged terrains in high-speed, off-road action that tests your driving skills in dynamic environments.

name: Offsuit Pair
summary: On a train ride to Chicago, two women try to repair their relationship over a game of poker

name: Offroad Rally Racing
summary:
Offroad Rally Racing is a fast-paced console racing game where you drive powerful rally cars across clearly marked tracks in different weather conditions, including sunny, rainy, and night races. Each track offers a unique challenge, forcing you to adapt your driving to changing visibility and road grip.

Win races to earn cash, which you can use to unlock and purchase new rally cars. Every victory brings you closer to building a stronger garage and taking on tougher tracks.

With easy-to-learn controls and exciting offroad action, Offroad Rally Racing delivers simple, fun racing focused on skill, speed, and progression.

name: Of Light and Darkness: The Prophecy
summary: Of Light and Darkness: The Prophecy is an Adventure game, developed by Tribal Dreams and published by Interplay, which was released in 1998.

name: Office After Hours
summary: Spot anomalies and uncover hidden clues to escape an office where overwork turns strange and experiments happen more often than coffee breaks.

name: Of Sense and Soul
summary: A queer Victorian romance visual novel in which a gentleman running from the past and a poet hiding from the future collide through a lonely hearts ad. Suddenly, their lives can blossom—if you choose to change them.

name: Of The Lilies
summary: When the curses that only come once a century suddenly resurface, you are tasked to stop them—with a choice that also forces you to face your past. Explore a lore-rich world with 5 possible love interests, and decide if choosing your own motives over the greater good is worth a single sacrifice.

name: Office Life
summary: It’s a story about after graduation life of college student. We guess it is a simulation game, besides which type of game it could be? We just want to provide a true real life with you in this way.

name: Of Roots and Gears
summary: Of Roots and Gears is a dialogue-based RPG in an aetherpunk setting. Explore the world where nature and technology are charged with magic. Make choices, find friends and enemies. Make your own path!

name: Offroad Delivery Service
summary: A courier and an off-road simulator rolled into one, where you are faced with an arduous task of delivering cargo of various sizes to distant and hard-to-reach places. Get contracts, earn money, upgrade your equipment and SUV.

name: Of Crowns & Chains
summary: Of Crowns & Chains is a solo-developed, grand-strategy sandbox video game where players lead a nation in a dynamic, historically-inspired world, currently in early alpha.

name: Off the Wall
summary: Off the Wall is a sports game that combines elements of racquetball and tennis. The game characters are moved between the net and their rear wall with a two-position joystick. A trackwheel is used to control the paddle that hits the ball. The game may be played by one player against the computer or by two players against each other. A game is over when one player scores 11 points.

name: Office Survival Simulator
summary: Juggle ridiculous office tasks, avoid sanity-sapping distractions, and beat the clock before corporate burnout takes hold. It's you vs. the workday—and the copier is winning.

name: Office Point Rescue
summary: Terrorists have invaded and taken hostages in the Emeraldalo Corporation's headquaters. Agent Foldon is assigned to infiltrate the building, dispatch the terrorists and rescue any surviving hostages.

name: Of the Devil
summary: Immerse yourself in neon, smoke, and high-stakes legal gambles as a Defense Attorney with uniquely Killer insights in this diabolically stylish visual novel adventure game.

name: Of Me and My Mirror
summary: A surreal, emotionally charged visual novel that explores identity, trauma, learning to let go of the past, and moving on.

name: Off
summary: “I’m the Batter. I’ve been entrusted with a sacred mission.” -- One of the most influential RPGs of the last 20 years is finally coming to Steam and Nintendo Switch. Take control of the Batter as he seeks to purify an uncanny and hopeless world haunted by specters, guided by a cryptic, grinning cat called The Judge.

name: Off Grid
summary:
"Off Grid is a 3rd person stealth hacking game where data is your most powerful weapon. Off Grid forgoes combat for hacking tools and ingenuity, and is completely moddable.

Gameplay utilises unique mechanics that allow you to manipulate the world and people around you with the data they unwittingly leave behind. It’s a stealth game where the player can truly hack and manipulate objects in the environment."

name: Of Peaks and Tides
summary: Step onto this vast ancient land shaped by intuitive physics, and form a new world born of your imagination. Explore solo or team up online with friends. Reforge the mortal realm devastated by divine wrath. Feel the world shift with your every move. Your lands await. Will you answer?

name: Of Ash and Steel
summary: Of Ash and Steel is an immersive third-person open-world RPG created by a passionate team that values the essence of classic old-school RPGs and modern designs. Explore the lands of a once-prosperous island, hone your combat skills, and survive in the unforgiving realm of the Kingdom of the Seven.

name: Offworld Trading Company: Real Mars Map Pack
summary: Designed by a planetary geologist, this map pack adds over 30 new maps to Skirmish and Multiplayer games.

name: Offworld Trading Company - Jupiter's Forge
summary: If you thought turning a profit on Mars was tough, just wait until you land on Jupiter’s volcanic moon, Io. With resources that deplete over time creating fierce competition, you will have to adapt to the new environment faster than your opponents do in order to survive.

name: Off-world Prospecting
summary: Off-World Prospecting is a game about mining for valuable resources, recovering long lost artifacts and resources left by a mysteriously vanished colony. Upgrade your tools, get rich, and unravel the stories of an alien planet as you delve deeper.

name: Off-Road: Redneck Racing - Off-Road
summary: Off-Road allows the player to race high performance buggies and sand rails across six stunning locations. Slide, jump, skid and wheel spin around circuits specifically designed to offer maximum thrills and spills.

name: Off the Record: The Linden Shades
Off The Grid
summary:
Welcome to Off The Grid, the heart-pounding Extraction Royale where survival is just the beginning. Dive into a dark, cyberpunk world crafted by visionary director Neill Blomkamp (District 9) and prepare to augment, adapt, and dominate like never before!

Gear up with custom cyberlimbs and hundreds of weapon combos, modifying your body and arsenal mid-fight. Extract high-value loot, outsmart your enemies, and transform into a force of destruction. You’re not just fighting to survive—you’re fighting to be the last one standing.

name: Off-Planet Dreams
summary: is an invisible puzzle platformer where dying is feedback, death is information. As you move about each level, your mind will fill in the blanks and any deaths are simply an instant restart showing you where

name: Offroad Masters: Motocross Races
summary: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled adventure with Offroad Masters: Motocross Races!

name: Of Life and Land
summary: Of Life and Land is a charming settlement-building strategy game paired with a rich simulation experience. Every animal and plant tries to find their place in nature while you lead your villagers to their future. Expand to different regions and trade with local factions to gain needed resources.

name: Offworld Trading Company
summary:
Offworld Trading Company is a real-time strategy game in which money, not firepower, is the player's weapon. Players lead their developing companies in cutthroat economic warfare against other companies looking to become the dominant economic power on Mars.

Loosely inspired by such classics as M.U.L.E., Offworld Trading Company forces players to make tough choices on what resources to acquire, what goods to build and sell, how to interact with the planet's thriving underworld, and when and what stocks to acquire.

Players compete against up to seven other AI- or player-controlled companies. The game is won when one player ultimately acquires all the shares of their competitors, thereby wresting control of the entire planet’s economy.

name: Offendron Warrior
summary:
Offendron Warrior is a retro arcade that combines shooting and defense, inspired by Williams Electronics' 1981 classic 'Defender'.

Your objective is saving Offendron civilians in the planets from the group of enemies, who are trying to spread a virus that turns Offendrons into mindless killing machines and eventually destroy the whole planet.

name: Of Orcs and Men
summary: Of Orcs and Men first puts the player into the role of an elite Orc soldier, Arkail, from the legendary legion of Bloodjaws. The legion is a league of warriors deeply involved in the war between the Orcs and the Goblins on one side and their persecutors, Humankind, on the other. As a veteran warrior who has seen the most brutal of battles, the player is appointed by the Orc commander to complete a mission that could change the course of the war, to kill the Emperor himself, the man responsible for the bloodshed. A Goblin, Styx, soon joins the player, an unlikely but indispensable ally.

name: Off-Peak
summary: You're stranded at a cathedral-like train station in the near future, searching for a ticket out of town. Explore the secret passageways, interact with strangers, dig for records, and get hypnotized by the soundtrack – a batch of original music courtesy of the band, Archie Pelago.

name: Of Bird and Cage
summary: Of Bird and Cage is an Action-Adventure Music Video Game! A first of a kind music album that is experienced entirely through a video game featuring world-renowned artists from (ex) Guns N' Roses, Epica, Within Temptation, (ex) Evanescence and many others!

name: Off The Record: The Art of Deception HD
Office Escape
summary: Infinite Runner for 2-Button Jam 2019

name: Of Potions and Spells
summary: In this game, you play as a newcomer to the Fairy Tail guild. Being a hentai protagonist, you of course wish to build a harem of the girls of the guild. Soon enough, you find a shop with magic potions and items that will do that and more.

name: Of a Feather
summary: A platformer for the birds!

name: Off The Record: The Art of Deception
Office Story
summary: Office Story is a business simulation and management game where players start with a small garage office and aim to build a tech empire. The gameplay revolves around making strategic decisions, managing employees, and developing apps or games to dominate the mobile market.

name: Office Chimp
summary: Smooth talk and manipulate your way to the top in this simulation-like anti-establishment game. Interact with your favorite Anime characters and gain their affections.

name: Offshore Racing
summary: Drive high speed motor boat in sea traffic along with police, pirates and golden boats. Be cautious of police patrols don’t crash into them. Collects coins by chasing and driving boat from sea traffic. Use rockets to destroy all pirates boats on you way.

name: O Formigueiro
summary: Use seus sentidos de formiga para navegar neste sombrio cyber-formigueiro e sair com vida!

name: Office Nightmare
summary: Work sucks, and then you die... and apparently become a zombie. A fast-paced third person shooter with some unconventional weapons.

name: Offcoast
summary: The rogue-like strategy game Offcoast takes place in a subterranean, underwater landscape.

name: Of Them That Have a Name
summary: A short game about memorials.

name: Of Light and Darkness: The Prophecy - Premonitions
Off The Record: The Art of Deception Collector's Edition
summary: A famous painter finds herself in over her head!

name: Office Hurdles
summary: Office Hurdles is a browser-based mobile game playable as a part of the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Off the Record: The Final Interview
Off Grids
summary: the ultimate open-world survival game that redefines the genre. Welcome to a world where you get to experience hunting, gathering, building, crafting, looting, exploring and even travel in time from 2030 to 10.000 Bc. Your resourcefulness are your greatest assets. It's time to embrace the wild.

name: Offroad Extreme!: Special Edition
summary: This is the super-charged turbo driven world of Offroad Extreme! Special Edition where intense, free-roaming, off-road racing takes on a whole new meaning! With multiplayer support you can compete head-to-head against friends using the wireless Wii Remote as a steering wheel.

name: Office Affairs
summary: Xbox Live Indie game.

name: Office Strike War: Multiplayer Battle Royale
summary: Office Strike is a multiplayer Battle Royale game where you can play with up to 24 players against each other in a battle for survival!

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Collingwood Super Quiz
summary: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Collingwood Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Collingwood.

name: Offshore Tycoon
summary: The Offshore Company, founded by the world’s greatest fisherman, has been handed down to you through ten generations of the Parker family. Collect 20 different real fish on a journey through the Indian and Pacific oceans. Prepare fish at 3 different factories, and sell them to hungry customers. You'll have to manage your time and resources carefully to grow your business. Working the sea provides plenty of opportunity for adventure too! Rescue lost swimmers, assist downed planes, and recover sunken treasure, then invest your reward in the company for higher returns! With your help, the Offshore Company will become largest ocean harvesting company in the world!

name: Offroad Truck Racing
summary: Offroad Truck Racing - innovation rally simulator about truck racing in different places. There you can buy your first truck and tuning it. After you can participate in international racing festivals in snow mountains, deserts, meadows and jungles.

name: Off to Work We Go
summary:
This short game was developed for the No Future Contest, a 'no future' game development contest with technical constraints and with a compulsory theme 'au travail/work it'.

The technical constraint I chose was to not have a single word or letter in the game.
The 15 best games created for contest will be displayed on arcade cabinets during September and October in Paris in Visages du Monde.

That being said, I hope you enjoy off to work we go! Use the cursor keys to move and use the mouse to look around. You will need the Unity webplayer if you haven't installed it.

You find a work facility on a lonely island. But what happens next, is it a strange dream or corporate reality...

name: Off the Record: The Italian Affair Collector's Edition
summary: Catch a ‘Foxy’ thief!

name: Office Dating Simulator 2020
summary: Escape your menial life.

name: Offensive Combat
summary: Offensive Combat: Redux!

name: Offenders
summary: Make deals with people to identify and distract your enemies in order to eliminate them one by one and clear the areas from them until you reach their leader.

name: Office Overtime
summary: That soulless office job you hate? It hates you too, playing video games during work hours was your fault. Catch up on overdue work before morning. Coffee is your best friend.

name: Of Light and Darkness
summary: Of Light and Darkness is the creation of an award-winning team that includes game designer Cliff Johnson of Fool's Errand, storyteller David Riordan of Voyeur, writer Ken Melville of Sewer Shark.

name: Official Wicked Vixen Silicone Scramble
summary: Official Wicked Vixen Silicone Scramble is a mini Virtual Reality experience. You've been abducted and find yourself in an alien spacecraft! Your alien captors are about to subject you to an Interstellar IQ test (IIQ). Pass the test and go home. Or don't...

name: Offside
summary: Between a Runner and an Hack & Slash game, Offside lets you play as the young boy through 4 exciting levels, in which reflexes and agility will be the key in defeating Olaf’s plans and getting back the soccer ball collection.

name: Offroad Scientist
summary: Its about a Scientist who drives an offroad vehicle to collect data samples. Soon he finds an alien message.

name: Off the Record: The Final Interview Collector's Edition
summary: A man is dying, and you’re the prime suspect!

name: Of Murder and Moonshine
summary: Of Murder and Moonshine, set in prohibition-era New Orleans, is a side-scrolling shooter filled with thoughtful assassinations, frantic getaways, and brutal combat.

name: Office Love Affair
summary: Office Love affair - This is a casual game with a wide variety of puzzles.

name: Of Blood and Descent
summary: A roguelike strategy RPG where each expedition shapes a multi-generational legacy. Explore, recruit allies, and continue your adventure through your descendants.

name: Office Perks: Act 1
summary: A game dev's job is never easy, but it's a whole lot better when there are perks everywhere you look! Office Perks is a lighthearted slice-of-life visual novel loaded with playful dialog and lots of opportunites for the more intimate moments in the professional and personal lives of 20-somethings.

name: Office Affairs
summary: Office Affairs is an immersive visual novel game that takes players on an exciting journey through the complex world of office romance. Navigate through a thrilling web of love, ambition, and personal growth as you juggle multiple love interests and strive for success in the professional realm.

name: Off Your Rocker
summary: For use with Amiga's Joyboard controller. A prototype game that was mass produced! It seems that Amiga sent these carts off to a company that handled the task of labeling them. During this time Amiga was in trouble and the games never got labeled or retrieved by Amiga. Years later they were sold off as scrap to a videogame dealer who added his own label and sold them to the classic community. Gameplay is similar to the handheld game, Simon.

name: Of Carrots and Blood
summary: Of Carrots And Blood is a twin-stick survival arena shooter about kissing bunnies, hungry mutants and a lot of blood.

name: Off the Record: Linden Shades - Collector's Edition
summary: A mysterious figure in red!

name: Offroad Legends
summary:
Drive the most amazing offroad vehicles of all time in this extreme hill climbing madness! Crash the barriers and fly above bottomless chasms with Monster Trucks, 4x4 off-roaders and six-wheeled Behemoths!
Use your best skills to beat the most mind blowing tracks and be the ultimate Offroad Legend!

name: Office Chair Curling
summary: in this game you throw office chairs at a target

name: Office Cat
summary: Embark on a unique entrepreneurial journey in a world ruled by cats! You are the boss of a burgeoning business empire, where adorable kitties lead the charge. Prepare to build, expand, and manage your way to riches.

name: Office Hustle
summary: A jittery comedy stealth game on a 2D-grid

name: Off the Record
summary: Ever dreamt of running a record store?

name: Off the Road
summary:
Hello Offroaders! The new open world off-road driving simulator is here! It's time to get Off The Road!
Drive your rig on the hills of your own open world, get into a boat and explore islands, pick a helicopter and fly freely to the top of the mountains or just walk around if you need a peaceful hike it's up to you.

name: Offensive Dimensions
summary:
Offensive Dimensions is a hardcore, dark themed, retro 2d action game. Currently is in early access phase.
The demo version is available for downloading. Please try that first. Also, the content of the demo version is identical to the paid version, for now.
I'll keep updating the Early Access version in the future and the demo version won't be updated anymore. If you tried the demo version and liked my game, then you can consider purchasing my game.

name: Off the Rails
summary:
Off the Rails is a tabletop game designed by Andrew Platt. Build tracks and race Minecarts under the Great Mountain to collect as many Jewels as you can before the ground underneath collapses into the Chasm, burying all the wealth forever!
Off the Rails is a strategic, competitive 2-8 player tabletop game with tile placement, risk / reward mechanics and tons of fun for everyone!
This app lets you score easily after the game is complete.

name: Off Air
summary: Jump, slide, and smash your way through an arena of blood thirsty robots in Off Air. A first person shooter where there are only two rule: Survive and Smile for the camera. Use your wits and speed and dodge around waves of enemies in an ever devolving world of chaos and lead.

name: Offroad: VR
summary: Always wanted to ride your truck in 3D Space? Well, it's finally possible! Offroad VR will bring you the best, Virtual Reality experience ever!

name: Of Evil and Darkness
summary: A group of paranormal investigators with their own television show head to a remote island to film an episode. Once there they encounter the evil that was let loose upon the island, long ago.

name: Offroad Night Racing
summary: Begin your adventure in the wilds today! This new and exciting offroad driving game lets you prove yourself in the rough terrain, driving and completing multiple different tasks!

name: Offroad Truck 4x4 Dirt Simulator: Rally Racing Game
summary: Gear up for the ultimate offroad experience in "Offroad Truck 4X4 Dirt Simulator: Rally Racing Game"! Embark on a thrilling adventure across two distinct locations, the scorching Desert and the untamed Woodland.

name: Offsea
summary: Explore an archipelago in a dark open-world ocean with a boat and a gun to uncover the terrible truth while being chased by something in the sea.

name: Office Life
summary: "Office Life" is a visual novel for adults only. A young IT specialist Jake is looking for a job and gets a good offer. His boss turns out to be a hot and seductive woman. He strives to conquer her using different methods, even the most daring ones.

name: Office Paradox
summary:
Jim has a boring job in an office in those big commercial buildings.

On Halloween, Jim was heading home, but when he took the old elevator down, he found himself in a different and scary situation.

Will you be able to hang on and survive this challenge?

name: O'Fox life
summary: O'Fox Life - Platformer, the main character is a Fox. In the game you have to help the main character to take a long way home.

name: Offroad Unchained
summary: Drive with speed, drift in the mud and jump with your car to cross the finish line first. Unchain the potential of your offroad cars by customizing and upgrading. Join teams, make friends and start your offroad legacy. That’s Offroad Unchained. Grab the wheel and compete in PvP races against players around the globe drifting on the rough and dusty gravel roads, snow terrains or in forests. Keep racing to propel through the leagues, unlock new offroad cars, and get to know Red Bull athletes in amazing off-road tracks.

name: Office Waifu
summary: Relaxing puzzle game with Sexy waifus.

name: Of Mist and Shadows
summary: Cast powerful magic by actually writing the magical words in the right syntax, as you explore the Plane of Shadows in this complex and intriguing roguelike.

name: Off-World Interceptor
summary:
You play a Trashman, a bounty hunter paid to capture criminal scum hiding on harsh alien worlds. 
 
Your job is to race the enemy crime boss to the finish, blasting his goons along the way. Get blown up or drive too slowly and the boss gets away. But if you make it to the check point in time, you block the boss' escape and trap him on the planet. 
 
You can upgrade your vehicle with the cash from your bounties. You can also go up against a buddy in the vertical split-screen deathmatch mode. 
 
Off-World Interceptor's most unique feature is the storyline, told in full-motion video. Standard for the time. But OWIE's FMV is mocked by a couple of guys sitting in chairs, a la Mystery Science Theater 3000.

name: Office Masters
summary: Office Masters is a game where you play as someone whose ambition is to become a Billionaire.You will start small answering emails and then eventually buy the whole company.

name: Off-Road Rides
summary: Off-Road Rides is an exciting 3D driving game in which you have to drive a car of your choice and avoid obstacles on a construction side off-road scenery.

name: Off_Duty
summary: A first person shooter with a thrilling narrative

name: Offscreen
summary: Escape from a flat 2D TV screen and discover a 3D world in this story-driven puzzle game! Embark on a journey between dimensions, walk across the neon city, through the screens full of unexpected puzzles.

name: Office Madness 2: Corporation
summary:
You always dream to be the boss of your company. Now you have opportunity. Hard working days are over. You are the boss!
Built your departments and rooms. Hire your employees and managers. Avoid attacks of union labor, virus attack on your accounts , fire and etc....
Keep your rooms clean and equipments are working properly.
Choose your decisions on employee's behaviour actions correctly and keep your employees happiness level high.

name: Of Man and War
summary: Of Man And War is a narrative driven WW2 based story game. This game was created for the Mood Jam in only 6 days.

name: Of Fair and Flesh
summary: I'm addicted to you ˗ˋˏ ♡ ˎˊ˗

name: Off Day
summary: A point & click visual novel about appreciating the little things in life.

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - St Kilda Super Quiz
summary: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - St Kilda Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team St Kilda.

name: Off-Road Farming
summary: Off-Road Farming is an unusual off-road farming simulator. In the game you will find unique locations, interesting levels, as well as various natural phenomena!

name: Of Mice and Moggies
summary: Smart puzzle game about catching cute animals by cleverly utilizing the environment.

name: Offroad Survival
summary: Survive a journey of a lifetime... if you can! Choose the best roads to reach your destination. Drive across difficult terrain. Obtain essential resources in any way you can. Solve a mystery and avoid a grim fate as you face unexpected challenges that cut you off from the rest of the world.

name: Off Shore
summary: Off Shore is a first person survival horror game with a nautical theme. You must survive while solving puzzles in hopes of being rescued from a derelict lighthouse.

name: Oftalmogarden
summary: Oftalmogarden is a fast and chaotic roguelike sci-fi eyeball monster shooting game. Shoot your way through hordes of enemies, collect upgrades, weapons, and gadgets to grow stronger, but accumulate curses over time. Speed is your best ally to survive, the sky is watching and death will not wait.

name: Offroad Racing on Line
summary: Drift, slide, skid! Offroad Racing Online is the isometric 3D perspective car racing game that makes racing funnier than ever.

name: Off the Wall
summary: Off the Wall is an arcade game released by Atari Games in 1991. It shares similar gameplay to Atari's classic, Breakout. Tengen developed a Sega Game Gear port, thought to be set for release around 1993. It was featured in some gaming magazines, as well as Summer CES 1993, but was quietly cancelled with no explanation. A prototype has since been found and dumped. No other home versions Off the Wall were ever released (a PC Engine version was planned before also being cancelled), though a similar (but unrelated) Atari 2600 game was released in 1989 by Atari Corporation.

name: Offroad Extreme!
summary:
This is the super-charged turbo-driven world of OffRoad Extreme you'll be racing huge V8 powered monsters around rugged terrain, including islands, massive arenas and volcanoes!  
  
OffRoad Extreme utilises an ultra-realistic physics system to ensure every bump, nudge, crash and crunch on the race track affects your vehicles as it should.  
  
Race well and claim victory against your opponents to earn prize money, which you can use to unlock extra secret Trucks and if you're really good, the ability to race through down the gullies and through the canyons at night!  
  
Those who are good enough can face up to the infamous OffRoad Extreme 
Challenge - an extended four-stage battle against the computer players, victory in which will unlock further Challenge cups and more powerful engines to power all your vehicles!  
  
OffRoad Extreme allows you to play against a friend, either in single races or competing together in Challenge mode. Will you be bashing your friend off the track and zooming through the winning posts in first place!  
  
Be careful, though, every time your truck takes too much damage, you'll lose some of your prize money on repairs!

name: Offroad Mania
summary: Offroad Mania — based on realistic car physics game for everyone, who like off road and challenge. We've prepared for you 120 levels (rocks, trees, bridges, ramps etc.), 5 amazing 4×4 off road cars (differents suspensions, engines) for fun driving.

name: Of Guards and Thieves: Zombie Rush
summary: Zombies come back to life, play as a guard or zombie and fight for precious brains to decide the fate of humanity.

name: Of Pith and Pumpkins
summary: Grow prize-winning ghost pumpkins in a graveyard in this non-violent feel-good game!

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Geelong Super Quiz
summary: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Geelong Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Geelong.

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - West Coast Eagles Super Quiz
summary: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - West Coast Eagles Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team West Coast.

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Essendon Super Quiz
summary: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Essendon Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Essendon.

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Carlton Super Quiz
summary: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Carlton Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Carlton.

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Sydney Swans Super Quiz
summary: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Sydney Swans Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Sydney.

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Adelaide Super Quiz
summary: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Adelaide Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Adelaide.

name: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Richmond Super Quiz
summary: Official AFL: The Interactive DVD Trivia Game - Richmond Super Quiz is a DVD trivia game released by the AFL with questions themed around the team Richmond.

name: Office Kissing
summary:
This is a very interesting game themes, and its operation is very simple.
However, to test your reaction speed, and play when you will feel very exciting.
In the serious business hours, you need to take your time of period which your boss turns back.

name: Off the Leash
summary:
There’s a new Chief of Police in town, and he’s put a ban on dogs, ordering them all to be captured! It’s your task to outrun those pesky cops and evade capture, whilst trying to rescue as many of your doggy pals as you can. Along the way you’ll need to eat food, collect coins, complete missions, and do all you can to avoid capture!
You’ll begin playing as a Golden Retriever, collecting coins as you go which can later be spent on various items in the store. Unlock new dogs, collect custom clothing, unleash super power-ups, and call on the mysterious Big Dog for help!

name: Office Girls and Games
summary: In this Visual Novel, you'll join Chloe and Jessie in the popular mobile game, Isekai Online. Eliminate arguments and disagreements in this strange duo and lead them to victory!

name: Office Dreaming
summary: Office Dreaming is an exciting 3D puzzle game for finding objects in a cozy office. There are many items on the location, there are numerous tables, office equipment, gaming tables and other office decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.

name: Offroad Jeep Quest: Mountain Trails
summary: The wild awaits—are you ready to conquer it?

name: Off-Road Drive
summary:
Off-Road Drive, the off-road racing simulation for PC, is the first game ever to deliver a true-to-life, off-road, extreme racing experience. Players will take part in The Russian trophy, Off-Road Trial, Thai Trophy and many other events through the worst driving conditions with a variety of natural obstacles like swamps, rocks, snow and sand.

No other game features this variety of off-road sport vehicles including tuned stock SUVs and trucks, as well as several classes of prototypes specifically built for off-road driving. The vehicles can be equipped with an assortment of special cross-country equipment and accessories including winches, low gear, differential gear locking, clinometer, altimeter, tire air pressure control, sand tracks, etc.

There has never been such an innovative simulation of interactive terrain response as well. Terrain under the vehicle will act just like it does in real life, the car will sink in dirt, the dirt will create a rut and will stick to the car and tires affecting its handling. Stones will fly from underneath the wheels and damage other trucks. The game will feature various surfaces that will not only affect tire friction but have complex reactions based on car weight, speed, wheel torque, tire condition, time on this surface, depth of car immersion into the surface and much more.

name: Offline
summary: A story-driven quest in which the setting plays a key role. Pay attention to detail and look for connections, ask yourself questions, and never forget the bigger picture, learning to read the symbolism that surrounds you. Are you playing?

name: Office Freakout
summary: Philbert is a disgruntled office worker who has been slaving away his entire life dealing with tedious reports, spreadsheets, grueling hours of data entry, and related crap.

name: Office Odyssey
summary: Office Odyssey is a laugh-out-loud adventure that pokes fun at the absurdity of corporate culture. With its casual roguelike mechanics, every run is unique, offering endless replayability and a constantly evolving office landscape.

name: Office Elevator
summary: Today might be just a regular workday, or you might end up in a complete alternative reality. Office Elevator is a survival horror game with puzzles that takes place in a dark universe.

name: Offworld Trading Company: Gold Edition
summary:
Exploit Mars, Jupiter and the asteroid belt with the Gold Edition of Offworld Trading Company.
This edition contains:
- The base game
- Both expansions and the first eight DLCs!

name: Off The Rails
summary: Hammer the buttons to power the hand car through each treacherous rail road.

name: Office Fight
summary: Laid off by Mega-corp, you're literally dead. As a ghost, possess office equipment, cause chaos, and ignite epic ragdoll brawls among coworkers for revenge. Office Fight: Work sucks, break stuff!

name: Office Simulator
summary: Try to turn a small garage start-up into a large company.

name: Of Guards and Thieves: Firefight
summary: Of Guards and Thieves: Firefight includes a new set of classes, Merc for Thieves faction and Pyro for Guards faction, plus Six new Weapons, Two new Gadgets and 10 new unlockable levels.

name: Office Management 101
summary: Take reign of a consumer electronics company in this lighthearted business sim reminiscent of the classics of the genre. Design and build your workplace, hire staff and manage projects in a game riddled with office humor and corporate satire.

name: Offside
summary: “Offside!” is a romantic-comedy sports-thriller Visual Novel where you step into the shoes of Alex Strider, an ex-footballer turned private investigator who uses his unique experience combined with a very peculiar (and oftentimes hilarious) way of finding out the truth.

name: Of Guards and Thieves: Hunting Grounds
summary: Of Guards and Thieves: Hunting Grounds includes a 2 new classes, Sniper for Guards faction and Hunter for Thieves faction, four new weapons, four new gadgets, one new official map called River Village, 10 new unlockable levels and more than 700 new jungle-themed map editor unique objects.

name: Of Three Plantagenets
summary: Three-map mini episode in a dark medieval theme. It has an extra start map and features a few modifications, some new sounds, models and textures.

name: Office7
summary: A guess-the-difference game modeled after an office hallway.

name: Offroad Bike Driving Simulator
summary: Race fast 🏍️ motorbikes 🎮 in huge offroad driving paradise🌴!

name: Off Road Rumble
summary: Have a blast racing and smashing your way to first place with this fast paced free style game. Contains a short race through the Sierra Nevada Foothills. A long endurance race in the desert. All games have a high degree of realism and fun due to high level of physics integration.

name: Of Mice and Dice
summary: In this roguelike deck-building game, you must recruit troops and use artifacts to repel the gnoll army until help arrives. Every new day the story unfolds, revealing new threats but also surprises. Roll the dice and command your troops to protect the kingdom!

name: Off-Road Paradise: Trial 4x4
summary: Off-Road Paradise is the 4x4 trial game featuring the most realistic off-road experience under extreme paradisiacal and impressive environments created for you to enjoy from the first minute in the most spectacular way.

name: Office Space: Idle Profits
summary: A licensed idle/incremental game based on Office Space.

name: Of Dead Earth
summary: Of Dead Earth is a third-person survival horror game set in Australian Outback.

name: Offroad Mini Racing
summary: Drift, slide, skid! Offroad Mini Racing is the isometric 3D perspective car racing game that makes racing funnier than ever.

name: Off Road Challenge
summary: The END of the ROAD is only the BEGINNING. Strap yourself in and get ready to ride! Players battle the elements and each other in a race that takes them across 6 rugged courses including the Mojave Desert, Las Vegas and Pike's Peak! Choose Circuit Mode and climb your way to the top of the heap. Course terrain includes snow, water, asphalt, dirt, sand, rocks and mud. Four selectable trucks and four hidden trucks. Players can customize trucks in the Speed Shop.

name: Officers and Crime
summary: Dynamic, realistic, top-down shooter. Nice interface. Pumping the character, because we can eventually get xp units, and spend them to increase the clip of an assault rifle, or to increase the dexterity of the character.

name: Off the Wall
summary: One or two players bust through blocks in various formations using a paddle and ball, trying to reach an exit located in the center of the blocks in order to advance to the next wave. There are glowing blocks which give you "Power Ups" Xextra ball, Ccatch ball, I invinciball, S slow ball, B bigger paddle, F firepower which allows you to shoot blocks with a gun located in the center of your paddle. You get points for busting blocks, but get more bonus points for blocks left when you reach the exit.

name: Office Is My Harem
summary: After being unreasonably criticised by your manager, you decided to fight back. Unexpectedly, this attracted your female colleagues. Could it be that a chance to fulfill your fantasy of having a workplace harem? This visual novel game has a readily story rhythm and lots of erotic scenes.

name: OfficeBotsVR
summary: Welcome to the office. Meet quirky robots who ended up working in a dreary office instead of following their dreams. Make friends, hear their stories, complete quests, or just trash the place in this heartfelt adventure game. Make sure you escape to follow your dreams because you don't want to get stuck there too.

name: Offroad Truck Simulator
summary: Are you ready to embark on the ultimate offroad adventure?

name: Office Suicide Saga
summary: Working at a large corporation can be a real nightmare. Well, unless you’re the boss. Now this opportunity stands before you! Take on the role of a supervisor in a big company and fulfill the most fundamental task of someone in your position – finish off your employees. Literally. Very literally. At the same time, don’t forget about the profitability of your business. After all, you need some funds for your yachts, expensive clothes and elegant, modern, eccentric furniture that fits your office with a stunning city view. Office Suicide Saga is a browser game, so you don’t have to install anything or order/buy at the store. You can play it wherever you have an Internet connection! Office Suicide Saga is also a free game,

name: Off the Road: Unleashed
summary: Immerse yourself in realistic sandbox environments all filled with challenging tasks and collectables. Sand dunes, frozen plains, mountains to climb and conquer. Explore 5 worlds with your favorite vehicle or just take a hike on foot!

name: Offworld Trading Company: The Europa Wager Expansion
summary: If you thought turning a profit on Mars was tough, just wait until you try your hand building a business on Europa. The smallest of Jupiter’s Galilean moons, Europa presents new challenges - and new opportunities! - for brave space entrepreneurs.

name: Of Love and Sorrow
summary: Of Love And Sorrow is a 120,000 word interactive novel following the story of two young brothers from the South, separated by war, love and betrayal. Starting with their ambition to become officers at the Westpoint Academy, the choices you make will direct the story - their lives, their loves, their very destiny is up to you.

name: Office Nightmare: Chapter 1
summary: Your boss trapped you in your office and you need to escape so you need to find a way out by solving puzzles, exploring the place, fight monsters, finding keys and more

name: Off Base
summary: Around medium-sized idbase map.

name: Offroad VR
summary: Offroad VR combines challenging physics-based offroad driving with virtual reality, offering an exciting game that allows players to explore diverse tracks with different vehicles.

name: Offroad: Dead Planet
summary: Offroad: Dead Planet is an offroading physics game. Play as a new arrival on Earth, unwilling to abandon the planet to ruin. Experience complex vehicle physics, terrain modification, deforming tires, a reactive driver, trash to pick up and robots murdering you all while carving your own path.

name: Off-Road Super Racing
summary: Off-Road Super Racing is an action-packed truck racing game for those who love the speed and competition. Race your way through the championship mode, or just play free with the single races.

name: Office Run: Halloween Run
summary: New environment with spooky atmosphere and themed obstacles. Updated and improved gameplay of the base game’s Arcade mode introducing new cycle system and monsters hunting the player. You better run for your life!

name: Off the Tracks
summary: Combine a heap of chaos, some physics-based fun, a dash of fluid movement and some poorly driven trains, and what do you get? Off The Tracks - a chaotic physics-based first person platformer.

name: Office Race
summary: Boss is out on some business trip and this means only one- it’s time to begin competition for the title of the Fastest Corporate Robot in the office! Prepare yourself for a merciless rivalization and great emotions! Race or die!

name: Officers: World War II - Operation Overlord
summary: Operation Overlord was the code name for the Battle of Normandy

name: Offroad Legends 2
summary:
This is your chance to experience the thrill of driving Monster Trucks, desert Trucks and 4x4 off-roaders over amazing jump filled hill climbing tracks.
Experience cutting edge graphics, ground breaking physics, amazing cars and adrenaline-filled excitement in Offroad Legends 2!

name: Of Ice & Snow
summary:
When her younger sister, Veni, leaves for the mainland, Lalao can't help but be hurt.

Leaving for the mainland means abandoning her.
Leaving for the mainland means disrespecting their family's legacy on the Isles.
Leaving for the mainland means she'd never return.

Unable to forgive Veni, Lalao finds herself pulled into an equally unforgiving world of snow, ruled by a Prince with a frozen heart...

Will she let herself be consumed by her pain, even if it means never returning to the island herself?

name: Offroad Outlaws
summary: Offroad Outlaws is a multiplayer off-road driving game where players build and customize their own vehicles, from trucks and quads to rock crawlers and side-by-sides. Players can adjust every aspect of their vehicle's performance, including suspension systems, chassis setup, and engine configurations. The game features multiple terrains across several maps, including desert landscapes, rock crawling trails, and a stunt park for freestyle driving. Players can explore these environments solo or team up with others in multiplayer modes, including capture-the-flag competitions and cooperative trail riding. The game offers various control schemes and includes a subscription option for additional features.

name: Offspring Fling!
summary: Offspring Fling is a game about a poor forest creature that has misplaced all of her children.

name: Offroad Thunder
summary: This off-road racing game from Midway is part of the company's "Thunder" line of products. It was released into arcades in 1999.

name: Offroad Horizons: Arcade Rock Crawling
summary: Offroad Horizons dares you to drive the perfect line through a selection of epic trails and stunning environments, in an exciting selection of powerful offroad vehicles, aware that any miscalculations could end your climb.

name: Office Combat
summary: Fight your coworkers to leave on time!

name: Of Ash and Dust
summary: Of Ash and Dust is Dark Souls Remastered overhaul mod, that rebalances the game, adds new weapons and spells, restores cut content and much more.

name: Office Zombie
summary:
You don't have to be an Office Jerk fan to love Office Zombie: the undead hit, where a casually funny zombie apocalypse meets the 9 to 5 office grind.

Use your makeshift arsenal to torment Zombie, just like old times! Grab whatever you have nearby: an explosive teddy bear, a rusty saw blade, your trusty hatchet, or even a Cadaver Heart to torment the undead Jerk to death - or should we say, undeath!

name: Office Jerk
summary: There's a Jerk in every office. A know-it-all, overachiever who comes in early, stays late and kisses up to the boss. Exact revenge on “that guy” with Office Jerk: grab whatever you can find, and hurl it at him!

name: Ofuxë the Guardian of Nature
summary: Control Ofuxë's kinetic abilities to free the wild animals from the scientists. Complete missions and progress through various maps and levels.

name: Of Blades & Tails
summary: A turn-based RPG that is action-oriented but rewards a thoughtful approach. Explore a fantastic land populated by different animal tribes. Follow the main story or hunt for treasures in ancient ruins and mysterious dungeons. Develop your character and gain powerful equipment.

name: Off the Record: Liberty Stone - Collector's Edition
summary: How much is the famous Liberty Stone worth? A life?

name: Office Mayhem
summary: A third person action game where you are sick and tired of working your BS job for your BS boss. You have officially lost your mind and are ready to cause absolute mayhem and chaos in your workplace. Turn ordinary office supplies into weapons of mass destruction and destroy your colleagues!

name: Of Mice and Sand
summary: Mice drive a Desert Ship as their mobile fortress to travel around the planet.

name: Of Ships & Scoundrels
summary: Of Ships & Scoundrels takes you on a journey to unkown lands that wait to be explored and conquered. As the commander of your fleet, you have to steer your battleships through a beautiful scenery of little islands, fight against enemies and so-called friends - and sometimes also forge dubious alliances.

name: Office Racer
summary: Office racer is a little racing game where you race around your office. Race as fast as you can! Get the racing started! You race like a furious head to win the competition. It a fun racing game and there is a cool background music bringing the atmosphere. You drive with a RCformula car fast as you can.

name: Of Tanks and Demons III
summary:
Of Tanks and Demons III — it's the new game with the vibe of classic arcades of 80's.

Collect photons, shoot demons, buy new tanks and improve them. Don't rely on brute force solely! Sometimes you need to outsmart your enemy, not just outgun them with bullets.

name: Office Overloaded
summary: Type quickly to process incoming documents without burning out. Sharpen your skills, climb up the ranks and challenge your coworkers around the globe. Can you stay cool under pressure and become the next CEO?

name: OFC: Ultimate Fighting Club
summary: OFC - ULTIMATE FIGHTING CLUB invites you to dive into the brutal world of no-holds-barred fighting, where the only rule is to win. Join a fighting club inspired by the intense atmosphere of real OFC tournaments, and level up your fighter to become a true champion.

name: Offroad Racing
summary:
Drift, slide, skid! Offroad Racing is the isometric 3D perspective car racing game that makes racing funnier than ever. Avoid collisions and don't let you be overtaken by the fast computer driven cars.

The game is built on the best vehicle physics engine available for real driving sensations and a very effective computer driven cars artificial intelligence system. It features high definition 3D graphics, along with rock music and realistic Sound FX.

name: Offroad Moto Bike
summary: Enjoy riding your moto bike on off road terrains, trying to reach the goal line of each level. You will have to face loops, brigdes, hills, jumps and all sort of obstacles. More importantly, you will have to watch carefully you gazoline consumption to make sure you don't run out of it.
